title: Patch Notes
content: at was blocked by Art's leg when playing as a short race. Fixed a pop and a depth-of-field issue in the scene with the Harpers out in the Shadow-Cursed Lands. Your weapon will now be visible when you choose the option to attack Isobel. Fixed your character snapping their body backwards and wibbly-wobbling around as though trying to pass beneath a cursed limbo stick in the cutscene where Kar'niss approaches you in the Shadow-Cursed Lands. Fixed a pop in the scene with Minthara in the Moonrise Tow
